name: Native Fish Species Richness (% of expected)
shortName: Native Fish Species Richness (% of expected)
functionStatement: Balanced native assemblages and trophic structure persist with minimal invasive dominance.
descriptionMarkdown: Community composition indicator reflecting native diversity and assemblage balance relative to expectation.
methodContextMarkdown:
Context: Channel

Method: Field (fish survey) and/or Desktop (existing data)
howToMeasureMarkdown: Survey fish community, compute richness (% of expected where defined) or abundance/biomass composition metrics, and score against SQT thresholds.

inputs.label: Native Fish Species Richness (% of expected)
inputs.helpMarkdown: Fish community surveys (electrofishing/seining) and/or compiled species lists from monitoring databases.
